form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Certification of Employment and Hourly Rate

full_text: 14 June 1955 TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: This is to certify that Severo Rodriguez is currently employed by Robert L. Guyler, General Contractor, at an hourly rate of $1.30 for an 8-hour day and 5-day week. LORENZO MORENO Superintendent Robert L. Guyler General Contractor
